welcome.title: Welcome to Audiolyn!
welcome.subtitle: Press 'Start' to begin the setup process.

library.title: Library
library.subtitle: Please select where your audiobooks library will be stored and how you want to manage it.

notEmpty.title: The selected directory is not empty
notEmpty.description: If you're using an existing Audiolyn library, you can ignore this message. Otherwise, keep in mind that selecting a non-empty directory as the library location may lead to issues later on.
